author: neilg
msg: document improvement in build system for situations in which the samples are to be compiled on a system where Xerces binaries are already located.

author: neilg
msg: fix to permit the samples source to be copied from a non-writable to a writable part of the filesystem, then compiled.  Binaries will also be dropped in a writable directory.  This should make experimentation easier on multi-user systems.  Patch by Steve Dulin
